text: Government launches Kisan Ki Butt to modernize agriculture practices. A new monthly radio program, Kisan Ki Butt, aims to empower farmers with scientific knowledge. Union Agriculture Minister Shivraj Sengchohan announced this initiative to modernize farming techniques. Farmers will receive cutting-edge information to enhance agricultural productivity and sustainability. The program focuses on delivering practical advice tailored to the needs of modern agriculture. Stay tuned for more updates on agricultural innovations.
